# mediaSelectionOption(withPropertyList:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the media selection options that match the given property list.

## Declaration

```swift
func mediaSelectionOption(withPropertyList plist: Any) -> AVMediaSelectionOption?
```

## Parameters

- **plist**: A property list previously obtained from an option in the group using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionOption/propertyList()] (`AVMediaSelectionOption`).

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionOption] object containing the properites passed by `plist`. Returns `nil` when no match is found.

## Accessing media selection options

- **options**: A collection of mutually exclusive media selection options
- **defaultOption**: The default option in the group.
